rajapaksha palanaya palanaya parada balayata pathwu "yahapalana" aanduwe me gewenne deweni wasarayi.rate parichjedayak wenas kala mahinda rajapaksha gedara yawimata "yahapalana" deshapalana sankalpayata haki wiya.namuth ada eya yatharthayak wi athda yanna pilibanda aththe prashnarthayaki.kima saha kirima athara wana wenasa wisin wathman deshapalana hasuruwamin hindiyi.eheyin janadhipathiwarayatada dan kala yuththa ha nokala yuththa bera ganima prashnayak wi athi bawa penennata thibe.

me athara poho dinaye janadhipathiwaraya athulu pawule samajikayan wisin aithihasika unagala wehera rajamaha wiharasthanaye prathisanskaranaya karana lada unagala wehera ෙchethya garbhaye sarwagnyadhathun wahanse thanpath kirima da janadhipathiwaraya athin siduwiya.

warjana rallak abhiyasa nosalunu shri lanka jathika rohala thama watina shramaya waya karamin ratadaya wenuwen yuthukam itukarana du puthun gilan wu mohothehi owunata jiwa wayuwa pimbaa sawibala ganwa yali nangituwalannata shakthiya athi pradhanathama aayathanayaki jathika rohala.

pilikawak hadi inna wita saukhyasampanna aahara ha sampradayika krama magin nawatha yatha swarupayata aapu age kathandare lokaye boho denata aaswadajanaka ha balaporoththu athi karana kathandarayak wuwa.

modara pradeshaye ada (08) aluyam kalaye siduwu wedithabimakin thuwala labu pudgalayeku kolama jathika rohala wetha athulath kara athi bawa wartha we.
rajya kalamanakarana sahakara sewaya
warsha 2000di sakshikaruwan hama sathiyema me hira gedarata awith apith ekka katha kala.
enam shri lanka nidahas pakshaya aanduwata gonu kara thaba ganimata yam prathigami kriyawaliyaka niratha wiya yuthu bawayi.

me nisa gowithanata ithamath sudusu parisarayak nirmanaya wi thibunu athara pera raja dawasa gowithana kumbaal karmanthaya, wadu karmanthaya, ran karmanthaya, dhiwara karmanthaya wani wiwidha wruththinhi niyalunu minisun gen pirunu gammana bihiwi me pradeshaye janawasa bawata pathwuna.piduru thalagala oya, nanu oya, gregari wawa wani oyawal osse jalaya gala with prasiddha diya ali wana dewon alla, senkleyar allath, puna oya osse galawith ramboda alla, puna alla saha garandi allath nirmanaya karamin kothmala oyata jalaya sapayanawa.me jalaya athithaye di keliinma basa giye mahawali gangata.
danata ape kiripiti walin ma demu.

me anuwa janapriya nawakathawath, ehi anthargathayath, samaja sansiddhin ha bandunu nibandhayak da wana bawin eya ithihasaya saha samaja hadagasma nirupanaya karana aithihasika sadhakayak bawata da pathwe.

wage wenawa...yanthan uththarayak dunne..

panthi kamaraya thula ha in pitatha wesena sisu sisuwiyan ha guru bhawathun menma wenath bahira sampathdayaka pudgalayinda sambandha kara ganimin wadath karyakshama igenum parisarayak bihikirimata mema sanniwedana shakthiya upayogi kara gatha hakiya.
